Element.Name: UBL VersionID
Element.Description: Identifies the UBL version on which the transaction instance is based.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Order identifier
Element.Description: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Order issue Date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued. Format YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Order issue time
Element.Description: The time assigned by the buyer on which the order was issued.

Element.Name: Consignment order indication
Element.Description: "Indicates wether the order is a purchase order or consignement order. Default is purchase order.

Element.Name: Document level textual note
Element.Description: Free form text applying to the Order. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure.

Element.Name: Currency
Element.Description: The default currency for the order.

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string
Element.Description: Used by the buyer to specify a reference that should be repeated in e.g. invoice to enable the buyer to automatically book e.g. to the right project, or account.

Element.Name: Order validity end date
Element.Description: The end date for when the order is valid. The end date for the time period within which the seller must respond. Format YYYY-MM-DD.

Element.Name: Quotation document reference
Element.Description: Information about Quotation Document reference

Element.Name: Quotation document reference
Element.Description: A requirement to give a unique reference to the quotation that is the base for the order.

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: Information about order document reference

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: Used to reference the initial order that was rejected and a new order is issued.

Element.Name: Originator document reference
Element.Description: Information about originator document reference

Element.Name: Originator document reference
Element.Description: A reference to Originator Document. To be able to give a reference to the internal requesition on the buyer site on which the order is based.

Element.Name: Originator document description
Element.Description: Originator document description.

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: Information about additional document reference

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: A short description of the document type.

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: Information about attachment.

Element.Name: Attached binary object
Element.Description: The attached document embeded as binary object.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: Information about external reference/URI.

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Contract
Element.Description: Information about contact.

Element.Name: Reference identifier
Element.Description: Positive identification of the reference such as a unique identifier.

Element.Name: Reference type
Element.Description: The short description of what is reference such as contract type, document type , meter etc. The type of Contract, expressed as text.

Element.Name: Buyer
Element.Description: Information about buyer.

Element.Name: Buyer
Element.Description: Party information.

Element.Name: Buyer party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR

Element.Name: pARTY Identification
Element.Description: Information about PartyID

Element.Name: Buyer party identifier
Element.Description: An identification for the buyer party.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Buyer party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who orders the listed items. Information about Party name.

Element.Name: Buyer party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who orders the listed items.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Information about postal address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number. An invoice must contain the seller‚Äôs street name and number or P.O.box.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text. In some countries regions or other type of country sub divisions are commonly used.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Information about country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: Information about VAT.

Element.Name: Buyer VAT identifier
Element.Description: The buyers registered Value Added Tax identifier. To be stated in case reverse charge is to apply to the purchase.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:VAT.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: Information about Tax scheme.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: =VAT

Element.Name: Legal entity
Element.Description: Information about Legal entity

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR

Element.Name: Registration address
Element.Description: Information about Registration address.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration address city name
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Information about country.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration address country code
Element.Description: Buyers legal registration address country ID.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information.

Element.Name: Contact ID
Element.Description: Customer reference (‚ÄúYour ref‚Äù) to be returned in the Invoice, e.g.Employee-no.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Seller
Element.Description: Information about seller.

Element.Name: Party
Element.Description: Party information.

Element.Name: Seller party endpoint identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the end point of the routing service.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example NO:ORGNR

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: Information about PartyID.

Element.Name: Seller party identifier
Element.Description: An identification for the seller party.

Attribute.Description: Must be according to "PEPPOL policy for identifiers", example GLN.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The name of the party. Information about Party name.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: The name of the party who orders the listed items.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Information about postal address.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post Code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: Information about country.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: The country where the address is. The country should always be given by using ISO code 3166 alpha 2.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Contact information.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact fax number
Element.Description: A fax number for the contact persons.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.
